CustomField.description: Main email address for the Organization receiving the Grant/Request this report is related to. Copied from a similar field on the Request record (which in turn is based on the Org email field on the parent Grantee record). Used in auto-generated report reminders.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Main email address for the Organization receiving the Grant/Request this report is related to. Copied from a similar field on the Request record (which in turn is based on the Org email field on the parent Grantee record). Used in auto-generated report reminders.
CustomField.label: Org Main Email
